archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Business Context
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
BUSINESS CONTEXT VIEW
The Business Context View is the first “real” view, meaning one you will share with the team, The Business Context View’s purpose is to identify and position the business elements in the context of the solution. It records the relationships between business entitries. It is the foundation of Business - IT alignment.
